text: 5.5 Stt 49.9, Ais 11.1, 11.10, Lom 15.12, Hib 7.14, Lep 6.1, 22.16 Pen bɨawl anep 24 okok, olap yɨp agak, Chaŋ ma lɨnɨmɨn agak. Nɨgan. Bɨ olap yɨb nop ak Chen Layon kɨles tek agɨlak agak. Ne Juda jɨj ak nɨb, bɨnonɨm Depid tɨkek tɨk dad amɨl, nop tɨkelak ne Bɨawl yek agak. Ne bɨ penpen gep ak kɨlop ñag jup tek, mɨj anɨb ak nag anep kugul ak wɨsɨbɨl, malakɨnɨgab agak.
